{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19727v1", "title": "Identities involving partitions with distinct odd parts and no parts
  congruent to 2 mod 4", "summary": "Recently, Pankaj Jyoti Mahanta and Manjil P. Saikika proved some identities
relating certain restricted partitions into distinct odd parts with the
partition whose odd parts are distinct combinatorially. They asked for the
q-series proofs. In this paper, we give q-series proofs of these identities.
Also, the number of partitions into distinct odd parts equals to the number of
the partitions with no parts congruent to 2 mod 4, so we can get some
identities. We also give combinatorial proofs of these identities.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-28T12:27:58Z"}
